multiple_choice.question: Who was the king of the bush?
Why did he send animals to the small lake?
Where did the Lion put the Elephant?

fill_in_the_blanks.question: The elephant was sent out as a guard
King Lion asked the elephant to call the frogs to come and eat the insects
The king told all the animals to always do exactly what he said

meanings.succeed: achieve the desired aim or result
meanings.volunteer: a person who freely offers to take part
meanings.guard: watch over in order to protect or control
